A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: These movies are supposed to be epic\, which is all about the hero's journey\, character development and arch. In other words: good writing.\nUnfortunately\, this is not the case. Great photography and prod design are ruined by poor writing and awful ideas. All new characters are found pretty much in the same state/condition which they were at the beginning of the film. Old characters are mistreated in many ways. This movie is a complete fail\, and no surprise it's the lowest RT score ever for a SW movie.
